definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: He has a small hotel and also caters for weddings and funerals.
sentences.chinese: 他開了一家小旅館，並承辦紅白喜事的酒席。

sentences.english: Sometimes people set off firecrackers to celebrate the red and white happy things.
sentences.chinese: 有時人們放鞭炮是爲了慶祝紅白喜事。
